line.text: %PLAYER%: This looks to be a computer node from one of the Genoshan airships. Some of the Cerci must have carried it in here along with some of this other junk.
line.textb: %PLAYER%: Just what we were looking for - a computer node from one of the Genoshan airships. Some of the Cerci must have carried it in here along with this other junk.

line.text: %PLAYER%: Better grab the memory unit from it. There might be sensitive information on it that Apocalypse could use against us.
%PLAYER%: Just what we were looking for - a computer node from one of the Genoshan airships. Some of the Cerci must have carried it in here along with this other junk.
